metadata.name: Open Edition
metadata.description:
Open Edition

New times, new opportunities and new tools.  
Every day technology develops at an incredible speed and a lot of things that were, for example, last year are irrelevant. 
Everything is being scaled, cloned, republished and devalued. Exactly as inflation is affecting the financial system around the world. 
There is more supply, but there is no value in it.

Open Edition is my message to anyone who has anything to do with NFT. 

The owner of all 3 NFTs of the OE series will receive a unique 1/1 co-created based on my secret series and the collector's wishes. 
Interaction - love - vibe.

Who knows what could be in these boxes? 
Where can you find the keys?

Remember what NFT was originally created for? 
To preserve physical and digital value by encrypting through a smart contract and sealing a token in a blockchain. 
To preserve value!

Many people have preserved here something that no longer exists in the real world and cannot be, something that is not replaceable, something that cannot be returned - that's what a non-fungible token is.

Open Editions has been around for a very short time, but it has already captured hundreds of thousands of people and artists. Millions of dollars and you know what I say? 
It's a good thing. 
But for those who came here just for the money.

I could be wrong and that's good too, everyone has an opinion and everyone should speak their mind. 
And at this point I want to show you that tons of trash thrown at the NFT market won't make it any better or more valuable. 
As you understand it's exactly the opposite.  
And buying a candy wrapper won't get you candy - that's the paradox.  
You also throw the wrapper in your pocket and throw it in the nearest garbage can. 

If you respect culture, why ruin it?  
That said, if you're only here for the money, that's your way. 

But if you want to create something really important and valuable you need to think about the fact that the creation of OE will not solve your problem and you won't create candy, wallowing in the wrappers. 
And you don't need to create thousands and thousands of 1/1s - it's the same as those wrappers, no history, no meaning, no value.

Create, create, share, and appreciate what you have. 
Every artist will find a collector who will appreciate you very much, not only because your art is very beautiful but because the thought behind it is so deep and close to his heart that the visuals won't matter at all.  
And every collector will find his artist.

It is a message to the future, the future - 1/1. 
The future - a value.  
The future - communication.  
The future - friendship.

6250x5000
